channel.title: Help ASAP! Please! L00000K!
channel.description:
Okay, I Have A Few Problems, Please Help Me.. Try To Fix Or Give Good Idea's :) Thanks!
1. Quest Tab Is Out Of Line... Like When I Click On "Veng Runes" It Give's Me The "Pots" Right Above It.. I Have To Click On The One Below It To Get What I Want. How Do I Fix?
2. How Do I Make A Certain Monster Drop PK Points?
3. How Do I Make Yell Command DONATOR+ (Regular Players Cant USE!)
4. How Do I Make It When You Kill A Guy It Gives You 2 PKP Instead Of 1 PKP?
5. How Do I Change How The "Dragonfire Shild" Hits?
[s]6. What Is A Banker's NPC Code.[/s] (Fixed)
Please Help.. I Know Some Of Them Are Like Use Your Common Since, But I Am Dumbfounded Right Now Lol.. And I Can Use All The Help I Can Get :) Thanks Moparscape Community!

item.title: Help ASAP! Please! L00000K!
item.dc:creator: @HotDogs1 HotDogs1
item.description:
@HotDogs1 wrote:

If your using a 317 Donator yell, And Pk points i can help.

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && (donator >= 1) {
if (command.length() > 5) {
String title = “”;
try {
if (playerRights == 0)
title = “”;
if (playerRights == 1)
title = “”;
if (playerRights == 2)
title = “”;
if (playerRights == 3)
title = “”;
if (playerRights == 4)
title = “”;

        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[" + title + "] - " + playerName + command.substring(5);
    } catch (Exception e) {
        System.out.println("Error in yell command.");
    }
}

For Pk Points Search
killerz.pkPoints += 1;
Change the 1 to 2.

Read full topic
